ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] (OT) jhenders' .sig
ygData.msgSnippet: 625 pages?? That s not a Jordan book, it s a short story. You might want to take this with a grain of salt, as the Jordan newsgroup FAQs don t list a definite
ygData.messageBody:
625 pages??

That's not a Jordan book, it's a short story.

You might want to take this with a grain of salt, as the Jordan newsgroup
FAQs don't list a definite date. In fact, they quote a TOR books rep as
saying they don't even have a manuscript yet. On the other hand, that may be
outdated info...

Sorry to continue the off topic thread.

Aranlas Starchaser
